text: Windsor Locks is a town in Hartford County, Connecticut, United States. As of the 2020 census, there were 12,613 people living in the town. It is served by Bradley International Airport. It is also the site of the New England Air Museum. It is beside the Connecticut River. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Towns in Hartford County, Connecticut Category:1854 establishments in the United States Category:1850s establishments in Connecticut
title: Windsor Locks, Connecticut
